articles.headline: Fancy Estate Haunted?
articles.content: Do you believe in ghosts. We believe this fancy estate on the outside of town might be haunted. Perhaps you should come investigate it and see what you find.
articles.author: Goober Newton

articles.headline: President of France to Visit
articles.content: The President of France is visiting, this is very exciting for our city. Yay France.
articles.author: Pussy Galore

articles.headline: Construction Going On
articles.content: People are building things, how exciting. This building should be completed around February of next year
articles.author: Chaz Ewelio

articles.content: This is also an article, currently it is not about anything
